devices_included: Whiteboard, large vertical display: Display wall
contribution_desc: BodyScape is a design space for classifying body-centric interaction techniques for interaction in multi-surface environments. The paper examines two interaction techniques (mid-air pointing and on-body touch) through a controlled experiment. The focus on the paper is on the quality of body-based interaction techniques for pointing and selecting in a multi-surface environment.
crossdevice_def:
"Multi-surface environments encourage users to interact while standing or walking, using their hands to manipulate objects on multiple displays."

"Multi-surface environments require users to be "physically" engaged in the interaction and afford physical actions like pointing to a distant object with the hand or walking towards a large display to see more details"
